column2: Production site accessible via custom domain
column11: DNS records configured at IT-Guru Online; Netlify deployment completed
column12: "1. Open browser. 2. Navigate to https://edmeca.co.za. 3. Verify site loads. 4. Check SSL padlock shows. 5. Verify https://www.edmeca.co.za redirects correctly."
column13: Site loads with valid SSL; www redirects to root domain
column14: Site loads correctly with Let's Encrypt SSL; www redirect working
column18: "SSL provisioned after removing old Replit TXT records (replit-verify). Cross-browser verified: Chromium

column2: Staging site accessible via branch deploy URL
column11: Netlify branch deploys enabled for staging branch in dashboard
column12: "1. Open browser. 2. Navigate to https://staging--edmecaacademy.netlify.app. 3. Verify site loads. 4. Check SSL is valid. 5. Verify content matches main branch."
column13: Staging site loads with valid SSL and correct content
column14: Staging site live and accessible; all content correct
column18: Netlify branch deploy configured in dashboard and netlify.toml

column2: Login button disabled on production
column11: Main branch deployed to production; VITE_ENABLE_LOGIN not set in production
column12: "1. Navigate to https://edmeca.co.za. 2. Inspect header - Log In button visible. 3. Click Log In button. 4. Verify no navigation occurs. 5. Inspect DOM - confirm no <a> wrapper."
column13: Button renders as disabled element with no anchor tag; clicking does nothing
column14: Button is fully inert - no anchor wrapper; cursor shows not-allowed
column18: Fixed after first attempt where disabled attr on anchor did not prevent navigation

column2: Login button active and navigates on staging
column11: "Staging branch deployed; VITE_ENABLE_LOGIN=true in netlify.toml staging context"
column12: "1. Navigate to https://staging--edmecaacademy.netlify.app. 2. Click Log In button in header. 3. Verify navigation to /login page. 4. Test mobile menu login button also navigates."
column13: Login button navigates to /login on both desktop and mobile
column14: Desktop and mobile login buttons both navigate to /login page correctly

column2: Login page renders with all auth options
column11: Staging branch accessible; user navigates to /login
column12: "1. Navigate to /login. 2. Verify Sign In and Sign Up tabs. 3. Verify email/password fields present. 4. Verify Google button with correct G icon. 5. Verify GitHub button. 6. Check no Mail icon."
column13: Login page shows tabs; forms; real Google G coloured icon; GitHub icon
column14: All elements render correctly; Google icon shows correct multi-colour G
column18: Google icon SVG manually added to replace Mail icon from lucide-react

column2: Google OAuth opens consent screen
column11: Google provider enabled in Supabase with correct Client ID and Secret
column12: "1. Navigate to /login. 2. Click Continue with Google. 3. Verify Google OAuth consent screen opens. 4. Check consent screen shows EdMeCa Academy name. 5. Verify account picker works."
column13: "Google consent screen opens; shows EdMeCa Academy; user can select account"
column14: "Consent screen opens and account picker works
column15: but shows Supabase URL instead of EdMeCa Academy"
column19: OAuth consent screen app name pending supervisor update in Google Cloud Console

column2: Email sign-up sends confirmation email
column11: "Resend SMTP configured; domain verified; email templates set; Confirm email ON"
column12: "1. Navigate to /login. 2. Switch to Sign Up tab. 3. Enter test email and password. 4. Click Create Account. 5. Verify success message. 6. Check inbox for confirmation email."
column13: Success message shown; confirmation email received within 2 minutes
column14: Success message shown; confirmation email received from Info@edmeca.co.za
column18: Initial test failed with Gmail SMTP (500 error). Resolved by switching to Resend.

column2: Confirmation email sent from correct address
column11: Resend SMTP configured with Info@edmeca.co.za as sender
column12: "1. Complete sign-up flow. 2. Open received email. 3. Check From address. 4. Verify sender name. 5. Check reply-to if applicable."
column13: Email received from Info@edmeca.co.za with sender name EdMeCa Academy
column14: Email from Info@edmeca.co.za - EdMeCa Academy confirmed

column2: Confirmation email has branded template
column11: Email templates updated in Supabase; logo uploaded to Supabase Storage
column12: "1. Receive confirmation email. 2. Verify EdMeCa logo renders. 3. Verify button colour is navy (#1f3a6e). 4. Verify footer shows Info@edmeca.co.za. 5. Check mobile rendering."
column13: Email shows EdMeCa logo; navy CTA button; branded footer; readable on mobile
column14: Logo renders from Supabase Storage; button is correct navy colour

column2: Confirmation email CTA link works
column11: Confirmation email received; link not expired (24h window)
column12: "1. Open confirmation email. 2. Click Confirm my account button. 3. Verify redirect to staging site. 4. Verify account confirmed. 5. Attempt login with confirmed account."
column13: Account confirmed; user redirected to site; login succeeds
column14: Email link worked; account confirmed; login successful

column2: Confirmation email lands in spam
column11: Resend SMTP working; domain verified; first send to Gmail inbox
column12: "1. Complete sign-up flow. 2. Check primary inbox. 3. Check spam/junk folder for confirmation email."
column13: Email lands in primary inbox
column14: Email received in spam/junk folder
column18: "DMARC TXT record (_dmarc) added to IT-Guru DNS as remediation. Deliverability improves as domain sender reputation builds."

column2: Sign-up error displays friendly message
column11: Gmail SMTP misconfigured (to validate error handling)
column12: "1. Navigate to /login > Sign Up. 2. Enter valid email and password. 3. Click Create Account. 4. Verify error message displays. 5. Verify no raw API error shown to user."
column13: Friendly error message shown; not raw Supabase/API error text
column14: Error message shown: Error sending confirmation email
column18: Error message is user-friendly though SMTP was causing 500 internally.

column2: Password mismatch validation on sign-up

column13: Error shown: Passwords do not match; form not submitted

column2: Password too short validation on sign-up
